tasks.task_description: Check DESS data format and requirements
Verify DESS has VA regression implemented
Check if DESS data needs filtering
Monitor memory usage during DESS training

description: Quick test of DESS model to assess feasibility and memory usage for DimABSA task
context: DESS data format checked: Uses JSON with tokens, entities, sentiments. VA already in format '7.83#8.00'. Has 3727 samples, max 20 entities, avg 3.06 entities. Dataset 'dimabsa_combined' already configured in Parameter.py. VA regression already implemented (types_va.json).

DESS analysis complete: Max 20 entities (vs 26 Pipeline), 1 forward pass (vs 6), memory 10.7GB with batch=1 (safe). No filtering needed. VA regression already implemented. Ready to train. Created DESS_QUICK_TEST_RESULTS.md with full analysis and training commands.
